thread.title: Kylie Jenner flashes hint of toned torso in Puma campaign
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner flashes hint of toned torso in Puma campaign | Daily Mail Online

author: Christine Rendon For Dailymail.com
title: Kylie Jenner flashes hint of toned torso in Puma campaign

organizations.name: puma fierce swan training shoes buy
new look black snakeskin print panel sports leggings

text:
She may be reality television and social media royalty.
But Kylie Jenner looked every bit the athlete as she stretched out her legs while posing in Puma's latest campaign.
The star, 19, gazed seductively at the camera as she laid flat on her back while outstretching a leg into the air.
Scroll down for video
Putting her best foot forward! Kylie Jenner looked every bit the athlete as she stretched out her legs while posing in Puma's latest campaign
Copy Kylie Jenner in a pair of Puma printed leggings £40 Puma Active Training Women’s Clash Tights
Shop here now!
Buy now
Kylie Jenner heads up another campaign for Puma this season, becoming the face of the brand's latest collection.
In one shot she poses up a storm in a pair of printed leggings teamed with a pink logo sports bra and a pair of white hi-tops.
If you're looking to update your workout wardrobe these statement leggings are the perfect way to inject some fun into your gym bag!
Follow the link on the right to get your hands on them now then complete your look below.
Or for more choice scroll through the carousel for more options from River Island, Elle Sport and New Look starting from just £17.99!

In the photo, which was posted to the brand's Instagram account on Tuesday, Kylie had her jet black locks scraped back into a ponytail and she flashed a hint of her toned torso.
The reality star wore a hot pink Puma sports bra, a pair of navy blue leggings, and white trainers from the brand.
In the pics she's also sporting Puma sneakers, in competition with older half-sister Kim Kardashian's husband Kanye West's Yeezy line.
After Kylie's ambassador deal was first revealed, Kanye hit out at Puma for trying to 'divide the family'.
Leap of faith: Jenner got her kicks in a snap from her Puma campaign
He tweeted: '1000% there will never be a Kylie Puma anything. That's on my family! 1000% Kylie is on Yeezy team!!!
But clearly the partnership between the teen and the brand is still going strong.
With a full face of makeup, Kylie looked ready to hit the gym in style.
In 2015, however, the reality star revealed she hadn't worked out in over two years.
'I'm living out my youth': Jenner, pictured in 2016, told InStyle UK in 2015 that she relies on her youth to stay trim
Kylie said she was relying on her youthfulness to keep herself in shape.
'I haven't worked out in two and a half years,' she told InStyle UK . 'I'm living out my youth not doing any exercise and eating what I want, which is pretty bad. I'm into yellow rice – you just cook it for 15 minutes, it tastes so good.'
Kylie's sister, Khloe, recently backed this up as she wrote about working out with her sisters on her website, khloewithak.com .
'Kylie doesn't really work out,' she said. 'She did come with Kourt and me one time, when Don was training us. Don does four quarters in each session and Kylie only stayed for one quarter.'
'Kylie doesn't really work out': Khloe Kardashian, pictured in 2016 in New York, wrote about her sister's exercise efforts in a recent entry to her website
